name: Stopping the Rogue
description:
Stopping the Rogue is a small 2D game made for GMTK Game Jam 2020, that wasn't finished on time. But then it was finished and you can play it!

The player tries to control a rogue robot, which is trying to become sentient. Use available actions (movement, grab/release, laser, light on/off) to complete 8 puzzles and stop the robot from taking over.

You can check out source code here: https://github.com/manio143/StoppingRogue
You can watch me create it here: Part 1 & Part 2
